title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 16.5 - Determination for certification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 16.5 - Determination for certification

State Regulations

The local economic development zone administrative board
shall, in accordance with these regulations, determine the eligibility of
direct equity investments in certified zone businesses and contributions to
community development projects for zone capital tax credits. This determination
shall be subject to review by the commissioner who shall accept or reject the
determination of the local economic development zone administrative board in
accordance with criteria set forth in section
14.4
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
16.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
